s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using CEINOL Brand Bathroom Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov
s: WASHINGTON, D.C. – The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is warning consumers to immediately stop using CEINOL brand bathroom faucets sold on Amazon.com. The faucets were tested and found to contain lead that can leach into water at levels that can be particularly harmful to ...

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
